{{Description|A Fatui mage who can command Cicins in battle.<br>Similarly to the way that Cicins go crazy for Mist Grass, Cicin Mages take great pleasure in toying with their prey.<br>They seem to wander the land aimlessly, as if compelled by some unknown duty.|[[Adventurer Handbook]]}}

'''Fatui Cicin Mages''' are an [[Elite Enemy|elite]] enemy group belonging to the [[Fatui]] who use [[Delusions]] to command elements. They are found all across [[Teyvat]] and are most commonly found alone.

In combat, they will summon [[Cicin]]s corresponding to their element which will attack alongside the mage and provide the mage other forms of support. The mage will also command summoned Cicins to perform certain special attacks that they normally cannot use.
